title: aaNDavan dharishanamE
sahitya:
ANDavan darishanamE tyAgEshan tANDava darishanamE



caraNam 1



pUNDiDum nAga kuNDalamADa vENDum aDiyAr vinaiyODa tyAgEsha darishanamE



caraNam 2



candirak-kalaiyum tazhuvum mAnmazhuvum sundarar nigar anbar kuzhuvum tyAgEshan tANDav darishanamE



caraNam 3



maddaLam dArai magizhndiruc-cinnam cittam kaLi kUrum vaNNam tyAgEshan tANDava darishanamE



caraNam 4



pApangal Oda bhaktargaL kUDa dEvataigaL kaLiyADa tyAgEshan tANdava darishanamE
